name: Cheese Carnage
description:
Step into the shoes of Astrid

A girl trapped in a maze as punishment for attempting to escape the "Foboxias". Your only chance for forgiveness is to steal all of Scratch's cheeses.

The dark and damp atmosphere of the maze, combined with Scratch's threatening presence, creates a disturbing ambiance that will leave you on edge.

The maze and the number of cheeses in the game are procedurally generated, meaning that each playthrough of this horror game is unique and different.

Game by: @Cataxis Audio by: @ORPSRAC Model 3D: @Morion

Special Thanks:
